sentences.en: "Cheers," he said and winked daringly at her.
sentences.cn: “干杯，”他边说边大胆地向她使眼色。
欢呼声盖过了他的叫声.

sentences.en: Cheers rang out from the assembly hall.
Her dancing brought loud cheers, wolf whistles and applause.
sentences.cn: 她的舞蹈赢来震耳的欢呼声、口哨声和掌声。

sentences.en: The cheers of the audience drowned the professor's voice.
sentences.cn: 听众的欢呼声淹没了这位教授的声音.

sentences.en: The crowd drowned his last few words in cheers.
sentences.cn: 人群的欢呼声淹没了他的最后几句话.

sentences.en: The glad tidings gave rise to thunderous cheers.
The loud cheers drown out his shouts.
sentences.cn: 欢呼声盖过了他的喊叫声.

sentences.en: The players were greeted by rousing cheers.
sentences.cn: 演员们受到热烈的欢呼.

sentences.en: There were muted cheers from the public gallery.
sentences.cn: 旁听席传出了轻微的欢呼声。

sentences.en: They marched into town to the wild cheers of the inhabitants.
sentences.cn: 他们在居民们狂热的欢呼声中迈步走进镇里。

sentences.en: Three cheers for the winner — hip, hip, hooray!
sentences.cn: 为胜利者欢呼三声——嗨, 嗨, 万岁!

sentences.en: Three cheers for the winner: Hip, hip, hurray!
sentences.cn: 为胜利者欢呼三声: 加油, 加油, 加油!

sentences.en: When our trainer stopped speaking, there were a few dutiful cheers.
sentences.cn: 当我们的教练说完的时候, 底下是一些例行的欢乐呼声.

phrases.tran_cn: 使高兴；高兴起来；使振奋
让你振作起来，让你开心起来；让你舒畅些

trans.tran_cn: 举杯敬酒的用语，谢谢，再见
trans.tran_en: used when you lift a glass of alcohol before you drink it, in order to say that you hope the people you are drinking with will be happy and have good health

trans.tran_cn: 喝彩（ cheer的第三人称单数 ），鼓励，鼓舞
